Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Synonym: Neurogenic Dysfunction of the Urinary Bladder
Record.Description: Dysfunction of the URINARY BLADDER due to disease of the central or peripheral nervous system pathways involved in the control of URINATION. This is often associated with SPINAL CORD DISEASES, but may also be caused by BRAIN DISEASES or PERIPHERAL NERVE DISEASES.
